title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When I select a dataset in the expression builder, even after setting aliases for the columns in the dataset, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the aliases.
EB: After setting aliases for the columns in a dataset, the expression builder should display the aliases instead of the old column names when selecting the dataset.
SR:
1. Set aliases for the columns in a dataset. 
2. Open the expression builder. 
3. Select the dataset for which the aliases were set. 
4. Verify that the expression builder displays the aliases instead of the old column names.
